sentences.english: You wake me up, from profound coma and aimlessness.
sentences.chinese: 是你，将我从深深的混沌与迷惘中唤醒。

sentences.english: In the prison chapel, Lincoln gazes up at the chaplain.
sentences.chinese: 在监狱小教堂里，Lincoln迷惘地望着牧师。

sentences.english: The Web has officially bugged and bedeviled a lot of people.
sentences.chinese: 网络让许多人感到困扰和迷惘。

sentences.english: All work and no play could make for some very messed-up kids.
sentences.chinese: 只学习，不玩耍会造成孩子的迷惘。

sentences.english: Will Pei-pei be able to find the way after crossing the wall?
sentences.chinese: 陷入迷惘的霈霈，翻过墙可以找得到路吗？

sentences.english: But Tom remembers his love, Summer, as a series of joys and bafflements.
sentences.chinese: 但是莎莫在汤姆的记忆中只是一段段的快乐和迷惘。

sentences.english: Come to realize, the Bana open, bloody flower, the extradition of the Lost souls.
sentences.chinese: 恍然间，彼岸花开，血色花蕊，引渡着迷惘的游魂。

sentences.english: A lonely man, holding the incomplete heart, wander in lost edge.
sentences.chinese: 一个人，孤单地捧着残缺的心，游走在迷惘的边缘。

sentences.english: One red mitten lying lost under a poplar tree.
sentences.chinese: 一只红色小猫迷惘地躺在白杨树下。

sentences.english: The significance of alcoholism for the lost generation is multifold.
sentences.chinese: 酗酒对迷惘一代的意义是多重的。

sentences.english: Indifferent point tends to be at leisure, too hard, it is lost.
sentences.chinese: 淡然一点往往会是清风明月，太过执着，则就是迷惘。

sentences.english: We went through those last few college days in a numb fog.
sentences.chinese: 在大学最后的几天中，我们陷入了深深的迷惘。

sentences.english: Only a week before the TOEFL, I feel perplex all of a moment.
sentences.chinese: 下星期就考托福了，我却突然觉得迷惘起来。

sentences.english: Young Japanese, in particular, feel apathy and bewilderment.
sentences.chinese: 日本年轻人对此特别漠然和迷惘。

definition: to pace back and forth/to hesitate/to be indecisive
anxious and perplexed/uneasy and confused/suspicious and fearful
to lose (sth)/to drop (sth)/to feel a sense of loss/frustrated/disappointment/loss
